verses.verse: By the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> we sat <S%H3427><s%> down, yes, <S%H1571><s%> we wept, <S%H1058><s%> when we remembered <S%H2142><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
We hanged <S%H8518><s%> our harps <S%H3658><s%> on the willows <S%H6155><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

For there <S%H8033><s%> they that carried <S%H7617><s%> us away captive <S%H7617><s%> required <S%H7592><s%> of us a song; <S%H1697><s%> <S%H7892><s%> and they that wasted <S%H8437><s%> us required of us mirth, <S%H8057><s%> saying, Sing <S%H7891><s%> us one of the songs <S%H7892><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>
How <S%H349><s%> shall we sing <S%H7891><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in a strange <S%H5236><s%> land? <S%H127><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I forget <S%H7911><s%> you, O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> let my right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> her cunning.

If <S%H518><s%> I do not remember <S%H2142><s%> you, let my tongue <S%H3956><s%> stick <S%H1692><s%> to the roof <S%H2441><s%> of my mouth; <S%H2441><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I prefer <S%H5927><s%> not Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> my chief <S%H7218><s%> joy. <S%H8057><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> who said, <S%H559><s%> Raze <S%H6168><s%> it, raze <S%H6168><s%> it, even to the foundation <S%H3247><s%> thereof.
O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> who are to be destroyed; <S%H7703><s%> happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be, that rewards <S%H7999><s%> you as you have served <S%H1580><s%> us.
Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be, that takes <S%H270><s%> and dashes <S%H5310><s%> your little <S%H5768><s%> ones against <S%H413><s%> the stones. <S%H5553><s%>
